venue.name: GB & Lexi Singh Performance Center at Alternativesâ€™ Whitin Mill

item.description:
Please call the theater at 508-296-0797 and add your name, or names, to the list called "Diane's Meetup Group".

Also, respectfully, call the theater and cancel your name off the list if you have signed up and then decide not to attend.

The idea is to socialize at the wine and cheese reception prior to seeing a classic drama. However, if you can only attend the play portion of the night, please arrive no later than 7:50 PM.

I am confident that we will have at least 10 attending to meet the group rate requirement for the rate of $12 each. However, please be prepared to pay $15 for the tix just in case. EITHER WAY, accorrding to the ad, this admission INCLUDES the wine/cheese reception for this Friday, opening night only, starting at 6:30 PM.
item.name: Wine, Cheese, and Live Theater opening night only!
